name: Sagar Pawar
about: I'm an MCA student passionate about building clean, useful web apps. I enjoy JavaScript, Node.js, and turning ideas into working prototypes.

highlights.title: Clean UI
highlights.text: A minimal, modern aesthetic with focus on content.

highlights.title: Middleware Demo
highlights.text: App-level logger + data injection across views.

highlights.title: Modular Structure
highlights.text: Routes, views, and assets separated cleanly.

projects.name: MaidEasy
projects.description: A concept web app for booking maids by the hour with secure profiles and location search.

projects.name: Pradip Pawar Films Site
projects.description: A simple, responsive website for a production company.

projects.name: Hospital Management System
projects.description: A web-based application designed to manage hospital operations efficiently.
